items.name: Great Glacial Lake West Coast DIPA
items.desc: A lean and malt profile give this West Coast DIPA a crisp body to support the whirlpool additions of Cascade and Citra hops. Centennial, Columbus, Cascade, Cashmere, Simcoe & Idaho combine in the dry hop for big up front aromas of fresh citrus and dank pine, fading seamlessly into a residual and refreshing bitterness

items.name: Land Of Clouds IPA
items.desc: A simple grist of extra pale & wheat gives a soft, pillowy base to a hop schedule of El Dorado, Nelson & Moutere giving aromas rich in white grape, stone fruit, citrus and gooseberry.

items.name: Quiet Glow Pale Ale
items.desc: Super Pale, torrified wheat & carapils make up the grist for a soft malt character. Whirlpooled with Citra & Chinook then dry hopped with Sabro for coconut & stonefruit flavours.

items.name: Reflections Amarillo
items.desc:
The Reflections series takes a hop variety grown in two different parts of the world and combines them in one beer.
The second in the series showcases Amarillo hops from both the US & Germany, highlighting and celebrating the diversity in taste and aroma that can be achieved from a single varietal grown over two continents.
